title: Is Spider-Man Miles Morales Coming to PS4? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.28.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about Cuphead coming to PS4, more Spider-Man Miles Morales confusion, and more!\

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
TOMORROW, we’re reacting live to the Second 'Marvel's Avengers' WAR TABLE right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
It’s Major Nelson week on Kinda Funny!
Thursday, join Greg and Major Nelson for We Have Cool Friends.
Friday, Major Nelson joins Greg for Kinda Funny Games Daily.
Saturday, Major Nelson joins Snowbike Mike, Gary Whitta, and Alanah Pearce for the Kinda Funny Xcast.
That all is going down right here on Twitch, youtube.com/KindaFunny, Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames, and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:00 - Sony MAY have undersold Spider-Man Miles Morales - Sherif Saed @ VG247
00:18:35 - Animal Crossing is getting a new summer update - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
00:27:30 - More reports out of Ubisoft: there was a cancelled King Arthur Game - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:32:40 - Cuphead is surprise launching on PS4, TODAY - Michael Mcwhertor @ Polygon
00:35:15 - What do you think this could mean for the DLC that hasn’t been discussed for some time? - Best Friends Q:Damian
00:40:02 - That Hideo Kojima horror game may not actually be happening, Junji Ito Clarifies - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:42:20 - Out today
00:44:45 -  Brooklinen
00:56:40 - Squad Up:Hockey Singh(PlayStation) SSJ4trunks
00:57:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary Whitta
